original_text: And Moses came and called for the elders of the people, and laid before their faces all these words which the Lord commanded him.
korean_text: 모세가 내려와서 백성의 장로들을 불러 여호와께서 자기에게 명령하신 그 모든 말씀을 그들 앞에 진술하니

sentences.original_text: and called for the elders of the people
and laid before their faces all these words
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 앞에 이 모든 말씀을 두었으니
